overview: Some may consider it petty, others may think it is classy, but there undoubtedly is some style in a way you take revenge on your unfaithful girlfriend. Your plan is to seduce both of her treasured daughters and fuck them both, so she knows how it feels to be cheated on. But this plan requires good planning and some manly charm to achieve, and in the end you may expect her rage. Are you up to deal with these obstacles?
title: The Sins of Mothers and Daughters
